name: Aim Master
short_description:
Aim Master is a great application to help you achieve your aims better. You can use Aim Master to know how much time you spend on study, or how much time you’ve wasted every day, or how much effort you’ve made to practice speaking a foreign language, or how much effort you have put into maintaining a healthier body, or how well you’ve done to make your dreams came true, etc. 

☞ Why Aim Master can help you?
■ It’s for those who are serious about achieving their aims.
■ We are living in a world where we only need to work harder than others to success.
■ Benjamin Franklin used to list a table titled with temperance, silence, order, resolution, frugality, industry, sincerity, justice, moderation, cleanliness, tranquility, chastity and humility and checked his progress every day.
■ The numbers we committed on Aim Master will encourage us to do self-examination and know exactly how well we did on the past.
summary: A great application to help you achieve your aims better.
